trends: There have been 45 other sightings in Allentown
There were 2 other sightings in Allentown on or around September 19th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking down the street near my home in a south-south east direction. I was looking towards Jupiter and the sorounding stars when I noticed the stars looked distorted as though I was looking at them through water. I then noticed a triangular object. The object had 6 round "lights". 1 light at each angle and 1 light on each side. The lights were very dim. The color of the lights was a whitish orange. They seemed more like they were glowing or reflecting light from the ground. The object was moving very smoothly in a straight line. No sound. I could not tell the approximate altitude it was at. If the object was a low altitude, It was probable traveling at 20 - 30 MPH. I watched the object for about 10 seconds before it went behind a building. I ran back down the street in the opposite direction to get a look at the object on the other side of the building.I watched it as it moved away in a north east direction. I've been watching the skies for UFO's for about 45 years. I never seen anything like this. Even though I was always looking forward to seeing something like this, I found it a bit disturbing. During and after the sighting, I felt a bit shaken up.
Summary: Saw a triangular shaped UFO with 6 "lights"
